sections.title: 2024+
content: In my free time, I'm optimizing SmartHome automation with Google Assistant and Home Assistant.

sections.title: 2019+
content: Working as a senior Front-End developer, I daily dealt with technologies and systems like Git, Sass, gulp, Jira, Figma, etc.
Responsible for development, deployment, performance, optimization of Web Vitals on projects such as:
• project1.com - Main portal, public and internal sub-portals
• project3.com - Client and admin portal for user management
Deployment, results presentation, and training myself and clients in analytical and SEO tools:

sections.title: 2014+
content: Since 2014, I've been working on the IT project, where I was mainly responsible for the IT website's functionality.
During this period, I also served as a lecturer for Front-End courses, preparing students to work with technologies such as:
Additionally, I prepared the Front-End part for several complex internal portals during this project.
Collaborated with Example Company as a Front-End developer on projects like:
• exampleproject.com - Public website and deployment on Tidy CMS
• examplemedia.com - Public website, development of a custom CMS, and deployment
• Examplemedia - Internal portal for clients, development of a custom CMS, and deployment

sections.content: Thank you for taking the time to read up to this point.
